caption: It’s a part of a movie. The theme of the movie is spy and agent. It’s at night, and two men in black are talking with another group of people, the only source of the light is the light of a car. However, their talk fail and they begin to fight against each other. Meanwhile, a fat man is shot by a gun. His friends are afraid and after some time of thinking, they give up and give the box to the group of people. Next morning, they are in a hospital where on the bed is a man. A man is arguing with the man on the bed and he nearly kill that man.
